original_text: So I am about to wipe out Baasha and his house, and I will make your house like that of Jeroboam son of Nebat.
korean_text: 내가 너 바아사와 네 집을 쓸어버려 네 집이 느밧의 아들 여로보암의 집 같이 되게 하리니

sentences.original_text: So I am about to wipe out Baasha
and I will make your house
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 내가 너의 집을 만들 것이다

sentences.original_text: like that of Jeroboam son of Nebat
